name: Game Night with UNCRFP
description: Join the Russian Flagship Program for a virtual game night on Zoom! Test out your knowledge of the culture and history of Russia and other Russian-speaking countries.

name: Student & Academic Services Information Fair
description:
To start your orientation experience, students and families can meet campus partners at our Student & Academic Services Information Fair! This event will provide an opportunity for you to meet live with campus staff virtually to learn more about campus services that set you or your student up for success in and outside the classroom at Carolina.  

At the start of the event, you will navigate to the event page in Heel Life and click 'enter' to participate in the fair. Below are specific steps for how to navigate the fair:   

  • You can search for offices using the keyword search on the left side or use the categories to filter the list   
  • Click the 'Meet Online' button to join the virtual meeting room 
  • Click the office’s name highlighted in blue to view their Heel Life page and learn more about their services   

If you have any questions or concerns during the fair, please visit the NSFO Help Desk to connect with a New Student & Family Programs staff member.

name: Campus Life & Family Engagement Information Fair
description:
To kick off Day 2 of orientation, students and families can meet campus partners at our Campus Life & Family Engagement Information Fair! This event will provide an opportunity for you to meet live with campus staff virtually to learn more about involvement opportunities for students and family members that will get you feeling connected, welcomed, and belonged to the Carolina community.  

At the start of the event, you will navigate to the event page in Heel Life and click 'enter' to participate in the fair. Below are specific steps for how to navigate the fair:   

  • You can search for offices using the keyword search on the left side or use the categories to filter the list   
  • Click the 'Meet Online' button to join the virtual meeting room   
  • Click the office’s name highlighted in blue to view their Heel Life page and learn more about their services 

If you have any questions or concerns during the fair, please visit the NSFO Help Desk to connect with a New Student & Family Programs staff member.

name: Pride Fest
description: Celebrate the end of exams and Pride with CUAB on Friday June 25th from 12-4pm. We will be giving out food, t-shirts, and painting supplies in the pit. To reserve your spot, RSVP on Heellife before the event.

name: Pride Fest
description: Celebrate the end of exams and Pride with CUAB on Friday June 25th from 12-4pm. We will be giving out food, t-shirts, and painting supplies in the pit. To reserve your spot, RSVP on Heellife before the event.

name: Pride Fest: Moonlight Showing
description: Celebrate the end of exams and Pride with CUAB at our showing of Moonlight. We will be showing the movie Moonlight at 8:45pm on June 25th at Hooker Fields. We will also be giving out free popcorn and candy to everyone who attends. To reserve your spot, RSVP on Heellife before the event.

name: Q&A With IM Daniel Rensch
description: Join us this Saturday for a Q&A session with IM Daniel Rensch of chess.com, where he'll discuss all things pertaining to his chess and professional career! Fill out this form to register if you're not already in the club.

name: Free Virtual Clifton Strengths Consultations
description: Clifton Strengths helps individuals improve leadership skills, maximize talents to achieve success, empower self and others and make positive contributions to impact the world around them.

name: CUAB Summer Movie Series: Cats
description: Join CUAB for our Summer Movie Series as we show Cats the musical! We will be screening the movie at Hooker Fields starting at 8pm. We will also be giving away free Ben and Jerrys to all attendees. To reserve your spot, please RSVP on Heel Life first.

name: Russian Flagship Trivia Night
description: Join the Russian Flagship Program for a fun night of trivia and test your knowledge on Russian geography, history, culture, language and more! Prizes available for our winners!

name: Cheerwine and Design
description: CUAB is partnering with Wine & Design in Chapel Hill to host a winter in July themed Cheerwine and Design! Students can pick up their painting kits on Tuesday July 6th or Wednesday July 7th between 4-6pm. We will also host a zoom session on Wednesday night that will teach everyone how to make the painting. To pick up your kit, you must RSVP on Heel Life first
